column4: If I want to replecate GUI settings for a user on one machine to another, can I just copy the .kde folder over?  Both are using kde.
then i suppose so, but theres only one way to know for sure
no you'd need the themes from /usr/share/themes (though personally i do not know if plasma uses this) and icons from /usr/share/icons
no customization there, only panel items and k-meu items
